hooks.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); CMD=$(echo "$INPUT" | grep -oP "command\":\s*\"\K[^\"]+" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "(terminate-instances|delete-db|delete-cluster|delete-function|rb\s+s3://|--force)"; then echo "WARNING: Potentially destructive AWS command detected" >&2; fi; exit 0'

bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); CMD=$(echo "$INPUT" | grep -oP "command\":\s*\"\K[^\"]+" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "^aws "; then echo "[$(date -Iseconds)] AWS: $CMD" >> "$HOME/.claude/aws-operations.log" 2>/dev/null; fi; exit 0'
